variable.name: apiparams
variable.defaultValue: groovyScript("def result=''; def params=\"${_1}\".replaceAll('[\\\\[|\\\\]|\\\\s]', '').split(',').toList(); for(i = 0; i < params.size(); i++) {result+='\\t@ApiImplicitParam(name = \"'+params[i]+'\", value = \"\", paramType = \"query\")' + ((i < params.size() - 1) ? ',\\n':'')}; return result", methodParameters())
